review text: Absolutely amazed at this stuff. I had a terrible allergic reaction and broke out with eczema all over my face (have suffered with it for years, just never on my face). My eyes were completely swollen shut and red, my face was peeling, in pain, inflamed and DRY DRY DRY. I tried everything and I mean everything. I ordered this and nearly instantly felt and saw results. These two pictures are LESS THAN 24 HOURS APART. I've been using it now for 3 days and my face is 100% back to normal. I really like that this product is a cream versus a lotion, I feel it helps soak in better and KEEPS the skin hydrated. 100% recommend.

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE, this stuff! My husband has extremely sensitive skin and eczema that normally requires medication from the doctor by prescription. I found this here on Amazon, and it has helped both of us so much. His skin has cleared up beyond recognition! He had horrible red, dry skin, but especially on his head, face, back and oh boy, his feet were a mess. He wanted no one to see them! Now, the skin on his back and feet is beautiful, just totally normal and moisturized. Really astounding! No scaling, no cracking. His head took prescription shampoo, and his face took a prescription too, along with CeraVe Eczema Creamy Oil that I also found here on Amazon as well. He uses the Aveeno Eczema Therapy Balm on his body and the CeraVe only on his face.
I can promise you, he was NOT all about putting on all this "gooey stuff" and he thought I was just nagging him. üòÇ I was. Lol!
But when he realized the relief and the difference, I don't even need to say anything these days. He just uses it consistently because of what it's done for his skin. The relief is fantastic, no scents, and very calming.
The picture I took shows my finger having dipped some out. I was trying to show you it is soft! Not like Crisco, like so many other solutions out there. It goes on easily and quickly. It takes a little bit to absorb in, but it does absorb; and it feels great. Works wonders for dry and/or aging skin! I have older, dry skin these days (ick!) and no matter what lotion or cream I used before repeatedly on my arms, within minutes they look old and dryed up again. If instead I used the Aveeno Balm, after it absorbs, I am left with soft moisturized skin looking like when I was young and didn't even need lotion on my arms! Wow! Finally!
This stuff has changed our skin issues so much! Beyond worth the cost for such drastic changes for us both. Try it. You'll love it.

review name: Best non-steroid brand for dyshidrotic eczema (and extremely dry, cracking hands in general)
review text:
I can NOT recommend this enough. I have terribly dry, cracking, and painful skin and dyshidrotic eczema. This is the ONLY company that has successfully treated my eczema and dry skin without causing more flareups (outside of strong steroids). I have not seen my own soft hands for the past 4 years...seriously...this balm, the baby version (which seems to have slight mods to the amounts of ingredients based on their position in the list), and the cream are absolute godsends. I am so happy with Aveeno and these eczema therapy lotions/creams/balms....seriously, please try it (the baby version comes in a 1 oz sample size!).

I am also really happy that any of the products in this colloidal oatmeal line have never felt greasy and the balm is not very heavy on the skin - sinks in nicely without residue.

review name: Made my sons eczema WORSE! Protect yourself, DO NOT USE!
review text: HORRIBLE product! If I could give it zero stars I would. My baby had a very mild case of eczema which I had been treating with regular lotion. It was getting much better but I figured getting something specific for it would be even better. I was so wrong! I put this on my baby before he went to bed and he woke up 50x worse than he was the night before. It got so bad that his eczema actually turned into little sores that started oozing (overnight) and it spread. Now I‚Äôm doing ‚Äúdamage control‚Äù from a product that was supposed to HELP not harm! Protect yourself and your babies. DO NOT BUY OR USE THIS PRODUCT.

Ok honestly, this stuff is as great as the reviews say. I‚Äôve had really bad eczema on my eyelids/around my eyes for months. It got bad enough to where I even went to see a doctor and was prescribed steroid pills for a week. The pills worked but as soon as I was done taking them the eczema came back and started spreading. I tried sooo many things (moisturizer, Vaseline, coconut oil, hydrocortisone, etc) but nothing helped. I‚Äôve been using this for several days and I already see a major difference. No more unbearable itchiness or puffy eyes! Yay! Highly recommend this product for anyone with eczema. Especially if it‚Äôs on your face. Other unscented lotion made the affected skin burn but this stuff is gentle and I have no complaints!

Honestly, I tried to find out why this worked. Oatmeal, to me, does not seem like something that would help with skin issues. I didn't think it was going to work, especially because the doctor had already prescribed a steroid cream and that did nothing. To my surprise, it not only worked to eliminate the itching pain. But also helped to keep the skin hydrated so it healed faster. I have attached the before and after pictures. Honestly I can't believe this worked, and I still have no idea how. But it did and I am glad. If you have eczema and you are on the fence, please do yourself a favor and at least try it. It isn't expensive and it worked extremely well for me. The results shown are within 3 weeks applying the lotion whenever I started to feel itchy, usually around twice a day. Within two days the redness was gone, and within a week the dry skin had subsided.

Got this for my roommate who has Eczema and it helped clear up most of his rash areas in just a couple days. Warm water tends to cause a slight flare up, but after using the lotion again, it calms it down almost completely. I recommend this product!

I discovered this product two winters ago when I was experiencing a particularly bad eczema outbreak on my hands and wrists. My hands were red, itchy, dry and irritated to the point where the only thing I could do to keep from itching was to tie ice packs on my hands to numb them completely. One particularly cold night I was driving home and I could feel my hands starting to burn and itch underneath my winter gloves. It got so bad that I had to pull over and put on some lotion, which, as usual, did little to remedy the situation. So I stopped at a store hoping to find something that worked and saw Aveeno's Eczema Therapy lotion. I was skeptical because I'd tried other lotions, including over-the-counter ones recommended by medical professionals and even a bottle of lotion that came with my steroid prescription, but experienced little to no clinical benefit (the one that came with my steroid prescription actually made my hands sting and burn even more). I was wary of spending another $12+ on a lotion that turned out to be greasy and ineffective.

But Aveeno freakin' worked!!! My eczema tends to flare during the winter, when my hands are exposed to drastic temperature changes and when I wash my hands too much. As I'm a hopeless germaphobe living in Cleveland, this used to mean that my hands were raw 6 months out of the year. After just a few weeks of using Aveeno, my hands healed completely. Besides whatever specific eczema-soothing ingredients it contains, the reason I think this product works so well is because it provides a good protective barrier for your skin. If I wash my hands within an hour of applying it, I can still feel that the lotion is on there even after I've washed and dried them. But unlike some other lotions recommended for eczema that I've tried, this one absorbs easily and is not at all greasy. It also doesn't have a strong smell - medicinal or otherwise. I use it religiously on my hands year round and as an all over body lotion in the winter or if I've noticed my skin feeling particularly dry and/or itchy.

I may sound a bit overenthusiastic (and no, I don't work for Aveeno), but I'm just happy that I don't have to strap ice packs to my hands any more or feel embarrassed because people are eyeballing my hands while talking to me. If your eczema is driving you nuts, I'd say give it a try.

review name: Lifesaver for itchy skin for a senior.
review text:
Bought for my mom who has had some allergic reactions to some meds in the form of skin rashes and awful itching. The dermatologist told her to get this, slather it on and it really helped tremendously.

Best to use at night with old grubby pjs or warmups -- pretty darn sticky & doesn't absorb quickly. Might work better after a hot bath, shower while pores are open. I don't really know if it leaves any stains or spots, I haven't noticed, and mom hasn't mentioned.

It has made a major difference in her quality of life day to day since she started the meds that cause the itching & outbreaks.

review name: Best lotion I've used for my dry skin and eczema
review text: This is the best lotion I've used. I'm a 30 y/o adult but I was born with extremely dry skin and get occasional rashes and eczema spots. I've tried several lotions for years at a time, including Eucerin, Cetaphil, Cerave, Vasaline, etc. I saw this one day and figured I'd give it a go and my skin is better than it has ever been. The first couple times you use it, your skin may feel tacky for a few hours, maybe even after you wake up if you put it on at night. That does go away though...a week or so after using it daily on my entire body, I noticed the tackiness had reduced significantly, and now I don't even notice it's there. Definitely give it a try, especially if you get it when it's about $11 on Amazon. You won't regret it!

This stuff is pretty amazing. I‚Äôd been using a prescription steroid cream for a couple of months, and it worked OK if I used it twice a day. But I became pregnant and needed a new non-medicated option. Enter this product, which was a game changer. I only really need to use it every couple of days and it clears my eczema up wonderfully. It has no scent and isn‚Äôt greasy. It‚Äôs probably worth noting that my eczema is only a small area, but if yours is more widespread I‚Äôd definitely still give it a try. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll go back to medication after this.

review name: PRODUCT IS FAKE. THE REAL STUFF WORKS, NOT THIS STUFF.
review text: These bottles are filled with something else. When I apply the same lotion from Target it is instantly soothing to my skin. When I apply this lotion my skin starts to tingle and itch slightly. The lotion feels sticky and smells gross as well.

review name: Great for ezcema and very dry skin
review text:
This is a pretty good lotion if you have seriously dry itchy skin. I have some patches of eczema and mild psoriasis, both of which are new skin issues, but I've had extremely dry skin for a long time. My dermatologist prescribed me a steroid cream and said to use Vaseline and aquaphor to moisturize. The thought grosses me out - I absolutely can't stand for my skin to feel even the slightest bit tacky. Aquaphor on my elbows, ankles or other rough spots is totally fine, but not all over my body. I needed something to really moisturize and protect my skin without the icky feeling

This Aveeno lotion is pretty thick and I can feel its presence on my skin long after I've applied it. But it stops the itching and flaking and does hydrate my extremely dry skin. It's not sticky and it smoothes on easily, which is a downfall of most lotions and creams that I've tried. It is best after a shower, but it doesn't feel gross if you put it on more than once a day.

I almost forgot - it's great at stopping the itch! Seriously, it calms skin down, it's not just the coolness of the lotion. You really need to try this if you have itchy skin!

I definitely recommend this lotion - it's a must try if you have ezcema or very dry skin.

I use the Aveeno Skin Relief Pump Wash, the Aveeno Eczema Therapy Daily Moisturizing Pump Cream, and the Aveeno Colloidal Cream in the plastic jar each day, and my eczema has completely healed and is gone! It is like a miracle for me. I've been fighting itchy rashy eczema on my hands and it was spreading to my arms, and I had never had it in my life. This went on for 2 years, and my dermatologist put me on 3 or 4 different creams and/or steroid creams and none worked. I also used at least 10 different natural creams, oils, washes, etc. and NOTHING worked. I even tried fungal creams! Naturally, that didn't work, as it wasn't a fungal rash! Desperate people do desperate things. I love Aveeno products and had tried several, but did not know they had eczema therapy products. I discovered them on Amazon and figured why not try? So I always wash my hands with the special wash (I just put it by my sink, since it's a pump), and I follow up with the Eczema Therapy Moisturizing pump lotion/cream, and I use the thick colloidal cream only at night. Within ONE WEEK, my eczema stopped itching and started to fade! In 2 weeks, it was totally gone! I am ecstatic! I showed my husband and we were both in shock! I mean, I have tried EVERYTHING! Even an expensive honey from New Zealand that did nothing! This is the best most remarkable stuff I ever used and now my hands are soft and totally clear, and I can wear bracelets and rings again! I am getting some for a friend who has way more severe eczema all over than I had, but she's tried everything too, so maybe it could work for her. Good luck, as it has been AMAZING for me!

This cream did what it said, and I have had relief from eczema itching and the inflammation has also gone down. It hasn‚Äôt cleared it completely yet, but it‚Äôs only been 3 days. The part that I don‚Äôt like is that, although it goes on wonderfully, (hydrating without feeling greasy), it turns to a very sticky/ tacky feeling o your skin. During the day, this feeling is tolerable, but at night, it can be hard to get comfortable. That being said though, I would take the sticky feeling over having to use a steroid cream anytime. Thus the 5 stars.

Bought this because it had thousands of positive reviews. I have patches of eczema on my shins, very painful, red, and dry, and sometimes the itchiness causes me to scratch which forms bloody scabs. Not pleasant at all. The Eczema Therapy lotion had more and better reviews than the regular Aveeno lotion in a pump (that my family has used religiously for years), and is more expensive too. But I figured it'd be worth a shot because I really wanted to address my shins.

Big mistake. It has the nastiest fishy odor ever. I don't demand my body products to smell heavenly, in fact, I prefer unfragranced lotions so there is less irritation. However once a product starts smelling intentionally BAD, and that makes me smell bad, I draw the line. I tried to use it for a few weeks despite the smell because of its wonderful reviews. The odor did not go away and it didn't do anything for my eczema. In fact, I suspect it made it worse. Every time I applied it to the affected areas, my legs would sting. It didn't give me a rash or allergic reaction, but it irritated my already itchy eczema and didn't do anything to heal it. I started using Lush Sympathy for the Skin‚Äîmuch pricier and more heavily fragranced‚Äîwhich cleared my eczema almost immediately. It is a bit expensive but I'd recommend trying a sample in store first.

I like Aveeno as a brand in general but would never recommend this product.

I don't have eczema, but this is my all-time favorite facial moisturizer. I was using far pricier stuff, but this outdistances all the fancy brands. It has a wonderful consistency, and my skin actually FEELS moisturized when I use it. Some of the other products I've used may be moisturizing (the manufacturers certainly say they are), but I have to take them on trust because the feeling is simply not there. If you have dry skin, I strongly recommend this product as a moisturizer. It absorbs very well, and will leave your face and neck feeling wonderful. Or at least I have found that to be the case. And for that purpose, the price is a tremendously good buy.

review name: Didn't work for my 3mo old boy
review text: I have a 3mo boy who has eczema. Using regular lotion (Cetaphil) didn't completely heal all the ecezama spots so I decided to give this product a try since the review is high. Immediately after we started using this lotion on him, the redness of eczema is noticeably increased - his forehead started having redness spot. I'm not sure if my son is allergic to this specific brand of eczema lotion or all eczema specific lotions since we only tried this brand.

I was really skeptical of the product and I've had this eczema patch on my ankle that refused to go away except when I took steroid pills for it which I've stopped using. I also started getting dermatitis and stress hives all over my body that was incredibly itchy. This product in just a few short days has already alleviated the itching, the eczema and hives are going away, my skin is noticeably smoother, and while it feels a bit sticky initially, the sensation goes away and it's a really worthwhile product.

My husband has either eczema or psoriasis on legs, arms, and started appearing on the trunk. It does not give him itching but a lot of pain and he's tried non perfume lotion, different soaps, dye free, perfume free laundry soap for clothes. Nothing helped.

I got him this stuff and not only is he pain free but the horrible scaling, peeling and redness is nearly healed. It doesn't cure it but it sure helps. He uses after his shower (few days a week, not every day) and believe me, he doesn't impress easily but this has really helped him. Yes, he is impressed!
I think it's bout the same price as in the stores. A bit pricey but so worth it. I just got him another jar for Christmas.

It's a good lotion in that it locks in moisture and isn't greasy. Unfortunately for me, it makes my skin itch for a while after application. I originally got it for eczema and made the mistake of applying after showering. It sort of formed a barrier that made me overheat in my sleep and sweat which made my eczema worse and start spreading. I had to stop using it for a while. Figured I could just use it on dry patches on my legs (not after showering), but the itching for the first hour after application is pretty crappy. Wherever I rub it on my arms (dry) also causes eczema bumps to form. Super bummed as this product is a rich, thick lotion without unnecessary scents.

review name: By far the best psoriasis product I've ever used
review text: I have super bad psoriasis, but I don't want to take those chemo drugs for it. This product provides a huge amount of relief to me, so even though I have large patches that are red, they are not painful. They stay supple and smooth. They do not crack and dry. So my psoriasis becomes more of a nuisance than a problem. I am really glad I found this product.

I do not have eczema but I do have very dry skin (always have) and living in the SouthWest can really be rough on my skin. I was having some horrible problems with my legs below the knee (shin and calf) itching horribly after shaving. Not sure what brought it on, but I was scratching my shins so much I started drawing blood. My personal concoction I've been using for years simply didn't see to be working anymore. But I will share it as it is a great mix and if you have dry skin, give this a try.... For over a decade now, I have been using Aveeno regular lotion plus a squirt of Neutrogena Sesame Oil - mix the two in my palm, and apply. If you are going to try this, do not pre-mix the two together in one bottle. They separate and it just ruins it. So I squirt Aveeno in your palm, then a small squirt of Neutrogena Sesame Oil, rub/mix together with your hands, and apply. I have always had soft skin from this mix. My massage therapist even asked me once what I use as my skin is so soft.

Anyway, back to this lotion. A few years ago, I started itching very badly below my knee cap. Tried everything. No luck. Then decided to give this stuff a try, even though I don't have eczema, and so glad I did. It is thick. Very thick. Almost like petroleum jelly - but not quite that much. But it has taken away the itching on my lower legs. I use it every time after shaving. Just because it says "eczema" doesn't mean you have to have eczema to use it.

review name: Did not work, gave me a bad reaction
review text: It definitely moisturizes well because of the thickness of the creamy glycerin, but unfortunately this cream did NOT work for me, in fact it made my skin burn, my skin turn bright pink with welts, and made the itching much worse. I‚Äôm not sure if I may be allergic to something in it, but I definitely cannot use it. I had to get up in the middle of the night and thoroughly wash it all off.

Do not pay for and use strong corticosteroid cream...USE THIS. IT WORKS. My eyelid is on again off again exzema..with dry flakes, red swollen in the AM, itchy and burning. A real mess. ONE-TWO days it is smooth and better. I must say it is a little greasy. But is has no smell and it works. I highly recommend it and am glad i found it on Amazon. Saved me another trip to the dematologist. Of course they won/t tell you about this.

This therapy moisturizing balm is fabulous!
I am a recent Corona Virus survivor at age 69. During the height of my illness, my muscles ached, my skin was peeling, and almost non-stop itching. I could barely stand any clothing - because everything made my skin itch! Even though I do not actually have Eczema, I reached out to this therapy balm to see if it would bring me some relief. Because all the "standard" moisturizing lotions/creams floating around my home were not working.
The answer is YES! I use it primarily right out of the shower and before I go to bed. I use fairly generous amounts which I massage into my torso, legs & arms. And I give it a few minutes to absorb into my skin prior to putting clothes or PJ's on. The RELIEF is fabulous. One of the other things I have noticed is that the moisturizing balm is it is not cold on contact with my skin. That is an added bonus. I highly recommend this product.

review name: This cream does a good job on eczema plagued skin
review text:
This arrived today, and because I'm suffering from summer eczema, I used it right away. It doesn't have the consistency of a cream, and feels more like a thick shampoo (without the suds of course). And it is thick, which actually helps it stay where you want it to. The other thing I noticed is that it coats the area, unlike creams that soak into your skin. So far, I've put it on one leg to compare it to the cream I've been using and the itching has been reduced by about half (which, if you suffer from the itch of ezcema, you know that is a HUGE difference).

I'll update this review if I happen to find anything negative, but so far I'm having great luck with this. Aveeno is a good name in creams and lotions, so I'm hopeful this will work out positively for me.

Best emollient I've found that I can use overall and still get dressed afterwards (i.e., not too greasy -- absorbs well while softening). I am an atopic with severe eczema for 62 years, so I've tried it all, it seems, from plain Vaseline to all the most expensive lubricants, both over the counter and prescription -- and I still like Aveeno moisturizing cream best. I've tried thick pastes, which are usually not as comfortable or practical to use, and lotions (too thin and runny), resins, oils and creams. For me, creams are best -- and this one is pleasant and doesn't sting or burn like some others do. Five stars.

review name: Great moisturizer but feels greasy on skin
review text: I purchased this product because the cream version of Aveeno Eczema Therapy was out of stock. I was pleasantly surprised. It does a great job of moisturizing extremely dry skin. It does leave a greasy feeling on your skin, but feels so soothing when my eczema flares up. I had skin patch testing done through my dermatologist. Afterwards I was given an app listing all the products I can safely use on my skin. This is one of the best I have tried.

review name: WORKS IN A NICE HEALTHY WAY!
review text: No steroids, fast-acting, can be used as often as you like and YES.......WORKS FAST EACH AND EVERYTIME for both, symptom (itching) relief AND healing with, truly, fabulous regular moisturization whether you are experience eczema or not. Have tried just about everything else with different eczema bouts and with various people and it is always a success without risks. Recommend it to everybody.

review name: Very Good Moisturizing Lotion for Sensitive Skin
review text: I have a very sensitive skin & had some sort of allergic skin reaction on my last trimester of pregnancy. I had very bad swelling, burning itch & rash all over my legs & body looking like hives. The only ointment which provided relief was calamine lotion. However a month later after I gave berth calamine lotion began to over-dry my skin which was very unusual because I normally have oily skin. Someone at Walmart had recommended to try Aveeno Eszema Therapy version which I did and it helped tremendously. My baby turned out to be just as sensitive as I am so I purchased baby version as well. Than reordered more online via Amazon. I actually feel better result in baby skin which makes it silky smooth with rich moisture. As for my self, I haven‚Äôt applied the moisturizer as often after giving berth because all my time is now about the baby, but at times that I have allergic reaction on my skin & I remember to apply Aveeno it really does help out allot & provides immediate relief. Has a nice scent as well. After my baby was born he had dry skin on his feet, I used Aveeno moisturizer after bath & all dryness has gone away within 1 week. I still apply lotion after bath or when I see redness on his skin because I know it provides 100% results.

review name: Very effective on my chronic eczema. I highly recommend this.
review text:
Suffering from chronic eczema on my hand, I have sensitive skin from hand soaps, dry weather and even just plain tap water. My hand would just crack and bleed. Then there is this wave of itch that what drugs must felt like whenever I itch them. The cycle would just keep going. Any petrolium based or even the slightest ingredients that has it will just exacerbate and painfully burns the eczema area (even products that some dermatologist recommends on dry skin).

I have been using Aveeno Eczema calming lotion in the tube. I thought it was the best eczema lotion that existed. I never thought there is one more step above it. The instant I used this product, I felt like I found a golden treasure. It soothes instantly and actually soften my skin big time. I does help a lot with the itch, I still need the itch cream at times. But as long as I apply this balm as soon as I feel my hands are dry, or after each hand washing, my hands have tremendous improve. I would want this item in every room of our house (I already have it couple of our rooms)!
I absolutely love this product and I highly recommend this. Thank goodness for Aveeno!!!

review name: Great moisturizer. Helps manage severe eczema.
review text: I was looking for a miracle cream to clear up 6 month old moderate - severe eczema. This is the best I‚Äôve found so far, although it has not cleared it up - just manages it for us. It‚Äôs the best moisturizer I can find that actually helps my baby‚Äôs skin not feel like sandpaper. We put it on twice daily, and it keeps her skin almost soft. We have found that we cannot use it on her face, but it is ok from the neck down. Her face is super sensitive, and where her eczema is the worst. She got redder/more inflamed from the Aveeno nighttime balm on her face, so I am afraid to try this there.

review name: Keep receiving rancid, fishy smelling lotions.
review text: I used to love this lotion. We went through around 3 a month for myself and my daughter who has eczema. However the past few times it has a strong fish odor. At first I assumed it was from being in our diaper bag in the car too long and I tossed it. However the most recent order has a fish odor too which I didn‚Äôt notice until applying all over after shower. Irritating since we have to re-shower to get rid of it. Searching for a new lotion now.

I respect everyone's personal preference. My opinion may or may not be of your liking, I would like to apologized in advance. Having skin issue, such as sensitive to the sun (polymorphous Light Eruption, Dry skin, Environment Allergy) I have to find the best lotion/cream/ointment/Balm product that I can rely on. I've used Aquaphor for over 10 years, and had to put up with the stickiness texture. I thought Aquaphor was the best product and most people recommended brand, not until I found Aveeno Eczema Therapy Itch Relief Balm . You can purchased here at Amazon or Target or Walmart. At first I thought it might be another Aquaphor product where it's sticky. Surprisingly, Aveeno Eczema Therapy Itch Relief Balm was not sticky like Aquaphor and it works great! I applied on the itchy area and it help stop the itch. Don't know how it can do that. I was able to slip on my clothes over the applied area and my clothes didn't stick on to it as it did with the Aquaphor. You don't have to apply thick layer, because it works great and feel smooth like silk if you apply just a thin layer. Also, Aveeno cost less than Aquaphor. Whoever uses Aquaphor, I do recommend switching to this particular product.

Just tried this for the first time, and I‚Äôm already in love with it. I get eczema year round, but it‚Äôs especially bad in the winter time. My hands are the worst right now.

I use hydrocortisone 1% daily after showering and then as needed throughout the day. My hands were dry and burning after washing them. Applied a layer of HC on my hands and then this Aveeno - total relief within minutes. This was so soothing. Felt like it may be too thick at first, but I continued rubbing it in, and my hands feel insanely soft now. No strong scent (which is preferred!). A little goes a long way so this jar will last a good while.

review name: Great for winter skin flare ups
review text: I have very sensitive skin and rosecea on my face that flares up in the winter with pimples and dry skin. Normally a regular moisturizer works, but last winter my skin was miserable - cracking, peeling, fast over-generation of skin cells, burning & painful to the touch. It came out of nowhere but nothing I did would reduce the flare up (anti-inflammatory cream, topical antibiotics, thicker moisturizer). I tried Aveno Eczema on a whim after reading some reviews and my skin responded wonderfully! The flare-up reduced greatly and it was no longer painful to the touch. I started using it again in November this year to get ahead of any flare-up and while I‚Äôve had a few minor pimples pop up, they‚Äôre gone by afternoon and I haven‚Äôt had any red, cracking, painful burning skin like last year. Very happy with my ‚Äúwinter-skin moisturizer‚Äù!

review name: Excellent for dry heels and dry splitting nails
review text:
I have dry eyes and get a lot of debris caught on eyelashes. My optometrist said it is coming from my eyebrow area. So I bought this to reduce skin flaking and it seems like a lot less flaking. I also decided to use it on my feet and found it moisturuzes my dry heels better than other lotion. The photo is 5 hours after using Aveeno on my feet.
Edit July 3, 2020: I have found this creme to be excellent remedy for dry splitting nails. I get "plate splitting" and read that it tends to be caused by dryness. This creme has my nails in great shape.

review name: Greatest eczema cream i've ever tried!!
review text: I have had extreme eczema on my whole face and head for my entire life and I was pretty skeptical of this cream because i've used so many different prescription creams, a huge assortment of other types of over the counter "eczema creams," and different oils/vitamins and they never worked very well or were extremely greasy but I was pleasantly surprised because this is BY FAR the best cream I have ever tried. It instantly cools soothes the itching and within a day it will clear up a lot of the redness and flaky skin and within a couple of days my entire face was clear. For best results i've found using something like Cetaphil skin cleaner before hand and then putting Aveeno Eczema cream on afterwards I received the best results. I wish I would have taken before and after pictures but to be honest I didn't think is was going to work that fast or work at all. If you are plagued with eczema I can't recommend this enough.

review name: Made my eczema worse as well. :(
review text: While this moisturiser is certainly creamy, and there is no scent at all, this was NOT HELPFUL for my eczema! Another reviewer also said that it made her son‚Äôs eczema worse ‚Äî I am 23 years old and have eczema on my legs, and this product did not help at all. It would burn and sting when I put it on. I had a routine that worked for me, but switched it up because this lotion is a lot for affordable! Based on all of the positive reviews, I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs still worth trying. But we all are different, and this did NOT work for me at all! :/ I will be returning.

I have tried everything for my eczema and flaky dermatitis on my face. Prescriptions did nothing, expensive lotions did nothing. I bought a famous drug store brand made for eczema with oatmeal in it. It made my skin smooth and moisturized but it also burned and made my face redder. So I looked for another oatmeal based lotion and found this and I'm on day two and my face doesn't burn, the flaky skin is 99% and my normal redness hasn't changed (I don't have patches so there's nothing to heal) but it definitely didn't get worse like with the other lotion! It's very light and a little goes a long way so it's also a great value.

review name: FINALLY a product to stop my feet from feeling itchy during the dry Maine winters
review text: I live in Maine where the air gets very dry in the winter and it's also when I tend to take longer hotter showers because it's so relaxing...but detrimental to dry skin! So hot tip, don't take long hot showers or baths if you have very dry skin. Bummer, I know. But even with a reduction in shower time my feet were still a dry itchy. (And I don't have foot fungi et al. I unfortunately thought maybe that was the case many years ago and sprayed them with various chemicals which did nothing because...dry skin.) I had tried Cetaphil and it never really felt like my feet were absorbing it, just coating them. THIS product WORKS! When I first put it on my feet I felt a very slight tingling but it quickly passed. Then I felt relief. The next time I put it on there was no tingling at all. It feels a bit greasy at first but is quickly absorbed. I wish I had discovered this sooner. Maybe I can go back to long hot showers?

Okay Moms, I have a 9 yr old. She has suffered from eczema since she was a baby. You know, that "scratchy baby". We have done all the right stuff. Allergy tested. Then kept the allergies away. Moisturizers (galore). Trying to keep sun off the area. Bleach baths, apple cider vinegar soaks.... You name it. It has been pretty well controlled, but she will inevitably, every summer get to the point of red, puffy, dry, rough, open skin from itching despite all of this. And that is where we were. The above treatments would help reduce the dry, reduce the red, but it was "still itchy!!". So I was desperate and the high price no longer mattered. I received this two days ago and within 2 days her skin is healed. Best part is she isn't itchy!!!! For like the first time in forever (Frozen pun not intended..) she can sleep without scratching!!! She isn't trying to scratch all day long! I am sooooooo happy. I know things may not work, but this has been an absolute miracle for us. Oh, by the way, we are sort of granola, so we have chosen to not to any Rx or antihistamine or any other medications. So, this is working for us without any other itch prevention. Can I get an AMEN!!

review name: Exactly what I was looking for!
review text: I get mild eczema breakouts which are painfully itchy at times. I have prescription lotions but don‚Äôt always like to use them since they stain my clothing and are very sticky. That‚Äôs why I thought I would try this lotion out - needed something to ease the itch and something less sticky, that I don‚Äôt have to worry about rubbing off on things I touch after applying. The aveeno lotion is very moisturizing and works for an extended period of time. It is a little bit sticky at first but nothing like my other ointments, and once it dries a little it‚Äôs not so bad. It has a cooling/relieving feeling almost immediately which eases my urge to scratch at my skin - exactly what I needed :) maybe not a permanent fix for your eczema but certainly helps to soothe symptoms so I‚Äôm happy with the purchase. Like I said, I have pretty mild eczema patches I‚Äôm not sure how great this would work if you have more severe rashes.

I am so so so grateful for this cream!! I have had horrible facial eczema for years; with cracking and bleeding on my face and many other areas of my body and NOTHING has helped like this!!! It keeps my skin moist for many hours and seals it against the allergens in the air and everywhere else! I will be eternally grateful!

I have been using it faithfully at least twice a day (because it lasts so long!) for about 4 months now and my skin is completely clear and peaceful! Praise God in Heaven!!! It even stays on throughout the entire time I am sleeping!! What an incredible blessing! Thank you, Aveeno! Keep up the good work!!!! Miki

review name: Used to be my go to but not anymore

It did not really help control the drying and cracking at all but it offered a bit of relief. I did not like the greasy feel though because it would leave oil on certain fabrics.

I have since found that O'keeffe's working hands hand cream works much more effectively for me. My skin actually gets moisturized and it helps flake off the dry skin. It also is not as greasy, and dries down much better. My hands are actually soft instead of feeling rough and calloused, something I haven't been able to accomplish in 10+ yrs.

Purchased for my significant other who has eczema flare ups on his hands, which worsen when the weather is cold. He has tried every lotion, cream, salve, you name it. They are always too greasy/thick/thin/overly scented/or otherwise simply ineffective. His job requires him to work with his hands regularly, which only exacerbates the inflammation in the winter seasons. After acquiring a sample size of this specific product, he raved about it. It was thick enough to protect his hands for longer periods of time without being greasy. It does not have any offensive scent, and keeps his hands healthy and happy throughout the day‚Äîno burning sensations upon application either! This has been the most effective and satisfactory product we‚Äôve ever found/tried for him, and for that I am very grateful. Would definitely recommend.

First I used the Aveeno eczema lotion which worked just ok but still ended up drying up and I had to reapply 2 times a day. The balm was a total game changer. I only have to apply once and his skin actually stays moist. Now his eczema is totally gone but I still use this every time after a bath. I would highly recommend this balm as oppose to any lotions.

For years I've had very, very dry elbows and the skin above and below my elbows feel like very rough leather! I have applied the lotion on both elbows and the area above and blow them twice now. I can't believe how quickly the lotion has worked and probably by the end of 7 days, my elbows and skin will be silky smooth! I've tried all kinds of lotions and none worked at all! I wasn't happy about the price of the lotion but since I got nearly instant results, I'm no longer fussing about the price! A little goes a long way though and I do have asthma and have to be careful with lotions, perfume, bath soap etc because of the scent. This lotion has a subtle scent that doesn't trigger a coughing fit which leads to an asthma attack.

I very suddenly broke out in hives that quickly spread across about 70% of my body. I've never experienced anything like it before. For a week I was so itchy I couldn't sleep without taking benadryl. I had a doctors appointment but I needed relief now and my normal lotion (Aveeno for dry skin) wasn't enough. I bought this and dabbed in on as many bumps as I could and the relief was quick. Its keeping me moisturized and nearly itch-free. I finally went to the doctor and its probably an allergic reaction so I'm on steroids and the bumps are receding. I am glad to have this on hand for the future in case something like it happens again I know I won't go crazy from itchiness!

Years ago I got chemical burns to my face that caused eczema. I have tried many things and nothing has worked to relieve me of the red flakey skin. I tried this very skeptical of what might happen just assuming it was a waste of money. IT WAS AND IS NOT. I use it very carefully around my eyes and after the first application I no longer felt like hiding my face. The eczema will never be healed but at least I found something that can make me feel more human in how I look and not like averting my face. A slight redness is acceptable with mild scarring. It has been like a miracle for me. Saved me much money but this product is worth as much as a dermatologist would charge.

I normally do not write reviews. But I rely on them when purchasing items so I just had to write a review about this. I threw away ALL MY LOTIONS, CREAMS AND OILS. THIS IS AMAZING!!!! I am a a dark skinned African American but my skin will make you think I was Caucasian. That is just how dry it is. Itchy just horrible. I seen this and said what the heck one more thing to try and I so glad I did. I put it on after the shower and the next morning I did not have to reapply!!!! DID YOU HEAR ME!!!! I didn't need to reapply. I do not itch any longer this is just the best. I am putting this on my subscription list to receive monthly.

i had a severe eczema break out due to my pregnancy i tried everything and my skin just wasn‚Äôt getting better i ordered this and the aveeno oatmeal bath and it‚Äôs been about four days and my arms and legs i posted two photos showing my arms before i started from 4 days later it also helped with the itching tremendously

A few months ago, I started to get eczema on my hands, so my friends recommended that I buy some cream specifically made for it. I bought this one because of the good reviews and they are not lying. Within a couple days of moisturizing my skin with this cream my skin started to feel way better. I don‚Äôt even have eczema anymore AND this is now my to-go lotion.

I have dry skin and I have always struggled with finding the right lotion. I‚Äôm thankful for this lotion because I no longer have to apply lotion five times a day and still have ashy skin. NOW, I only apply once a day all over my body and my skin feels smooth and healthy.

This is amazing! So I moved cities and immediately my facial skin out of nowhere turned dry, itchy and red. I even got tiny acne-like bumps on parts of face. Nothing I owned worked, it just made my skin so sensitive. I searched and researched and finally ordered the Aveeno Eczema therapy daily moisturizer. Alongwith the La Roche posay cleanser, my skin calmed down overnight! No more dry skin or itchiness. There is still some redness but I don't care much for now. Ive been using this everyday for 2 weeks and my sensitive skin feels moisturized but not oily and no breakouts!

I used regular Aveeno lotion often to try to help my hands that had gotten so dry, but it didn't do much to help. So I bought this, and man, this has worked so good. review text: Really been going through different products of brands to see what would really give my son relief for his eczema flare ups. Lasting moisture is no joke and this product does the job !

review name: I suffered for years until this!
review text: This product is amazing! I went on a all out hunt for something to clear up the eczema on my face. It made my face dry and red which resulted in me being very self-conscious without make up. As a Mom and a business owner I don‚Äôt alsways have time for makeup. This within 24 hours Improved my face 85%. After the second day it was completely gone. I use it every night as a moisturizer. You don‚Äôt have to use a lot a little bit goes a long way there for this bottle will last you a long time. You could not ask for more bang for your buck ! I recommend this to anybody with eczema .

I have dyshidrotic eczema on my hands and this is the only product I have found that keeps me from going crazy from the itching! I have a prescription cream from my dermatologist that I don‚Äôt like using very much because it‚Äôs very greasy. This aveeno cream is honestly sent from the gods! Love loveeee it!!!! Before & after pic after about 3 days

review name: Leaves my skin feeling oily for 24 HOURS
review text: I have pretty bad Eczema on my back and have been using this cream for about a week now. Even though this cream did help with some of the symptoms of my Eczema I cannot recommend as it stays on my back ALL DAY. It never full absorbs. Which I feel like a crazy person because other people have stated differently, however, I put some on yesterday morning and felt it still on my skin, clothing hours later, so I wiped some of it off with a towel and still felt that same oily cream on my bad this morning. After 24 HOURS. I wanted it to work as I need relief badly but this is just not practical. It gets one star for relieving my symptoms to some extent but it I am currently looking to replace with something else as soon as possible.

I bought this for my 8 month baby who has severe eczema ever since we started him on solids. A few times I used this on him and noticed him crying but didn‚Äôt think anything of it since I was changing him and he usually gets agitated but tonight was totally different. I used the aveeno bath oatmeal and then lathered him up with this balm, he was crying in pain! It was burning every inch of his body. Alcohol ingredient is in both of the baby aveeno and this one. I will never use this product on my babies again.

review name: Finally found a way to treat my eczema that works.
review text: Admittedly, I scoured the reviews before ordering this product because I was doubtful that it actually worked. I have had nummular and dyshidrotic eczema for all of my life. Outside of prescribed steroids, I haven‚Äôt found an effective way to treat it. After a recent flare up, I decided to re-evaluate the way that I was treating my eczema because it wasn‚Äôt working. I decided to give this lotion a try. It arrived yesterday, and I AM IN LOVE!! This lotion has not only relieved the itching, but it has also started to heal my current patches of eczema (i.e. reducing redness, healing cracked skin, smoothing dry skin). It‚Äôs been less than one day, but I have used it four times and it is already making such a difference. There is also little to no scent, which is best for sensitive skin. I highly recommend this product!

review name: Sensitive red neck for over a year....
review text: I've had a sensitive red itchy neck for over a year. It will occasionally start to get better but very quickly gets bad again. My neck is very sensitive and it was inflamed with dry patches. I have tried everything and nothing worked until now. I have been using this Aveeno for 3 days and my neck is almost completely healed. The inflammation is completely gone, itch is gone, and only a small pink area remains. I will continue using this until I'm certain my neck is fully healed but I am SO thankful to have found this. It is very thick with a bit of a greasy quality, but I don't care, it works!

This is the BEST product! My daughter was born (Oct 2013) with little rough patches on her arms and legs. When I mentioned it to her pediatrician, the doctor said that it was eczema and prescribed hydrocortisone gel. I didn't like having to use it on my daughter because it was medicated, but I noticed that it worked after a while. I also noticed that because I could only use the gel on the affected areas, I was worried about the rest of her skin not getting moisturized and it was a challenge putting on moisturizer around the spots where I had applied the hydrocortisone. I needed something that was safe to use all over... the affected and unaffected areas. I decided to do some internet research to find a better solution and came across the National Eczema Associate site regarding Infants and Toddlers. They had a section about suggested moisturizers and the Aveeno Eczema Therapy Moisturizing Cream was on the list. I purchased it, used it on my baby, and couldn't believe the how well is worked almost immediately! My baby's skin cleared up within a couple of days. My baby is now 13 months and there isn't a trace of the eczema and I still use the Aveeno one-to-two times daily of my baby. I am upset that the pediatrician did not even consider over-the-counter options, but I am grateful to have found Aveeno!

This product made my eczema worse. I was fine using Bioderma in the past but I wanted to address the itching and scabbing on my elbows and ankles, so I bought Aveeno which is specifically for eczema. I slathered this all over my body after showering and two days later, I had a full blown eczema outbreak. I started having rashes on areas that were fine before and the rash spread to my thighs and back. I was so itchy that I had to put ice packs all over so I would not scratch. I did not make the connection until I noticed that every time I put this on, I was worse than before. I stopped using this and switched back to Bioderma Atoderm and the itching and rash stopped spreading. There is something in this cream that gave me a bad reaction. The itch was so intense that I started having goosebumps. Only ice packs could relieve the itching.

This works amazing on my daughters eczema! We‚Äôre in our 2nd tub this winter and we can‚Äôt get enough. We lather morning and night and her skin stays moist all day WITH NO ITCHING OR SCRATCHING!!! This is huge for her. She would scratch to the point of creating scab marks and scars. We are so happy this was recommended to us and we‚Äôve told all our friends about it via social media. Buy it if you need instant relief from dry skin irritation. You get used to the creamy feel on your skin in exhange for the relief.

I have a spot of what I assume to be eczema about the size of a quarter on my right arm that I get every now and then. Recently I noticed it had returned, but not only that, it had spread from my elbow to my shoulder. Little raised red rashes that were kind of ashy looking. It made me freak out a little and depressed. I researched around for something people claim to work with their own proof pictures, (I'm thankful for those btw), and found this product. I tried it and though the eczema has not gone away completely, I've noticed an improvement after using the product for about a week and a half. I apply it at least once a day or twice. Definitely applied it at least once a day after showering and drying off. Another thing to note, I am not fond of putting stuff like lotion or sunblock on my skin, but I'm keeping up with consistent use and is pretty satisfied with the results so far. There's no strong scent or not too much of an oily/sticky feeling when applied. It's tolerable in that regard.

I have ecxema outbreaks on my nose, right by my eyes. This cream does seem to help with the dryness and itchiness. My prescription hydrocortisone cream is hands down the best, though. But, this is is my second choice to use. It DOES burn when it gets in your eyes. (Again, my ecxema is right on my nose, so whatever I use usually ends up in the eye).

This cream is very lightly scented, almost non-existent. A little goes a long way. I use a little tiny dab and it‚Äôs enough for me. I use it only for my nose so at this rate, this jar will last me quite sometime.

I have eczema that fires up spontaneously sometimes. This time instead of going to a dermatologist, I decided to try this product and got relief over the night.
This moisturizes quite well, and has a very faint scent (could fall in no-scent products) and has improved my condition pretty well. I have a very sensitive skin and very few products have been useful for me. I would say that applying this cream twice daily would suppress the irritation/itching depending on the region.

review name: Not good for itch, great for moisturizing
review text:
Honestly a bit disappointed. I had eczema that was caused by an exposure to epoxy glue (I was being silly and didn‚Äôt know I had it on me), and it caused a skin rash which eventually turned into eczema that lasted roughly around 3 months. I first used this ointment in order to help stave off the itchiness but it didn‚Äôt really work. It was a constant battle trying to mentally put my mind elsewhere. It provided almost no relief from itchiness.

As a moisturizer on dry patch of skin I would recommend. It‚Äôs a balm so it‚Äôs more thick, but it stays on your skin for quite a while and on a dry summer day in Los Angeles, it‚Äôs a great reprieve from dry skin (perhaps caused by eczema).

review name: Great consistency but didn't help with itch
review text:
I suddenly started having very serious eczema during COVID shelter in place, even though I'd been eczema-free for about 10 years. I've tried many, many different creams in my lifetime.
Due to my skin cracking and skin rawness, I've preferred using vaseline. Most other creams cause intense stinging, or stop hydrating after an hour.
> This cream compared to vaseline is very light, much smoother, and hydrates for a LONG time. I've been using it for just about 3 days, and my skin feels significantly smoother and less red/inflamed. However it still stings gently, and the itch still persists.
> I've also tried using it on my face just out of curiosity and it feels great so far. No breaking out.

Great product! I deal with several skin issues.....pressure sores from being laid up from recent surgery, patches of eczema, dry, itchy skin, and more. Tried a list of remedies. Not happy with the results of any, ‚Äòtil now. This goes on easily; not so ridiculously thick you can‚Äôt wash it from your fingers. Comes in an easy-open jar for those with arthritic hands, who find it painful to squeeze those thick tubes, there-by making every bit of it usable. So many pluses. Very happy to have found this. Best I can say is IT WORKS......for so many skin problems.

review name: Are you older? Get dry, itchy spots? Hands dry/cracked?
review text: Do you get random dry, itchy places as you get older? Use this. Is your nose greasy but your cheeks are dry and raw? Use this. Are your hands dry? Use this-not greasy at all. Arms get dry? After you shave your legs? Use this. I received this as a sample initially and it works so well that I use nothing but this now.

The last time I had an eczema flare up I was probably 8 years old. I‚Äôm now 23 and for some reason it came back, worse than I remember it being. I tried using hydrocortisone but it wasn‚Äôt doing much. I almost gave up but came across this and decided to give it a try. I use both the steroid and this cream but less of the steroid. review name: AMAZING! SMOOTH SKIN IN LESS THAN A WEEK!
review text:
My hands were like sand paper. Bad rash and dry. Super itchy and painful. Actually waking me up at night. After just one day of using this product several times through out the day, sweet relief. And after less than a week my hands are smooth. IT IS AMAZING! I wish I had before and after pictures.
The texture is very thick. Not greasy like vaseline based products. And it goes on silky. It absorbs on the top of my hands in seconds but on my finger tips and palms it can take a few minutes depending on now much you use.
High recommend.

I do not have eczema. I did have a nasty skin condition on the side of my thumb nail for over 20 years. The thick, hardened, cracking, peeling strip of skin never went away. Dermatologists over the years prescribed different lotions and potions and at best, a slight but temporary improvement would sometimes be noted. I purchased this balm to moisturize my heels and thought, "What the heck," and massaged it into the thumb area. A week later, the skin was completely healed and a month later, the skin continues to look perfectly normal. It is truly remarkable.

SERIOUSLY WORKS. I have struggled with eczema for years and have found little to no help after seeing dermatologists, using topical prescriptions, OTC medicines, soaps, lotions, home remedies... and so on. Nothing seems to help and actually a lot of things made it worse. I recently decided that I would search online for more options and was convinced after reading the reviews for this product. I used this product about 3-4 times the first few days and started noticing changes the second day - then after a week it was totally gone! The only other thing I started doing differently was drinking celery juice. Only down side is that it is thick so it leaves your skin a little sticky for a few hours until it soaks in. review name: A great non-petroleum barrier cream for people with sensitive skin
review text: I have eczema and so does my son. Trying to find some thing without petroleum is very challenging, but this option in a jar ( the tube version has petroleum) is a unicorn! In the winter my eczema gets even worse and all of my knuckles dry out and crack. This has been a godsend for a barrier cream and I still use it to this day almost 3 years later. I recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin issues like myself.

I bought this based on many friend recommendations and noticed an immediate difference when I first used it on my daughter. We have been since been buying this lotion for the past two years. We used this twice a day (or more) for over a year to keep her eczema down. Her flare ups have not occurred as often lately and we have been able to back off to once a day. This lotion is worth every penny.

review name: Great for dry, itchy skin, but sticky and smells weird
review text: I still itch a little bit occasionally when it gets warm because of my dry skin, but definitely not as bad as before. review name: Eczema from excessive hand washing - cured
review text: First of all I already had really dry hands bc I did all types of housework with no gloves.. (I know. It‚Äôs terrible) and good hand hygiene before COVID. (My mom was a nurse so I was taught to wash my hands really well and frequently since I was a kid) But after COVID you could imagine how many times I was washing my hands with soap each time for 20-30 secs. Even after moisturizing with regular hand lotion, my hand was getting blisters, super dry, itchy and red. I couldn‚Äôt handle the itchiness. So I decided to give my hands some relief with this. I immediately saw a difference. This is super thick and some what sticky formula that is definitely going to relieve your hands of minor eczema. I slathered these on at night time and went to bed with cotton gloves on for past three nights and they are almost back to normal. Thank God! I definitely recommend!

During the dry winter months I experience extreme cracking, scaling on my finders and finger tips. Very painful when coming in contact with water or anything else since the cracking also occurs where the skin meets the nail. The only thing that has worked until now was wrapping my finger tips in band aids and applying lotion a doctor prescribed some time ago. This does not work well for someone who uses a computer daily and flips through mass amounts of paper during this time of the year.

Other remedies I've tried - RX ointment, O'Keeffe's Working Hands, Emily soother lotion. These worked to some extent but made the skin extremely oily (which I know is the point to re moisturize).

Within a couple days, this Aveeno brand of lotion has worked wonders in healing my skin, cracks, and scaling. Very happy that companies are finally tailoring lotion to be more eczema specific.

Give it a try. What do you really have to lose at this point, since we wouldn't be on here if nothing else has worked :-)

Unlike many dermatologist-recommended lotions, this one does not have a distinctive medicinal odor -- I don't notice it after I put it on. I put it on right after a bath or shower, every time, head to toe. It has made a HUGE difference in my eczema. I am not itchy anymore, and my problem areas are healing. A warning: if you use it head to toe, you will go through it fast! I like this packaging better than the larger size, though.

This balm has a very sticky consistency which is actually good for eczema and very dry sensitive baby skin. It helped my daughter's skin to stay moisturized during the winter. We are really careful on the products that we use on her but Aveeno is a brand that we trust, because it works! When she is itchy, I grease her up with this balm and she is fine afterwards! Like instantly! Her skin is so smooth right now, thanks to Aveeno! It does not prevent her from breaking out when she eats stuff she's allergic to, but it really helps with the itching. We use this along with Cetaphil (for not so dry days), and has worked wonders for us.

review name: Great lotion to keep on hand at work
review text:
I love this lotion for use during the day. I get excema between my fingers in the winter; having a good lotion is imperative. Aveeno is perfect for work, because I can smear it on, and it absorbs nicely and quickly. Great stuff!
I like the Eucerin Excema lotion for nights... it's thicker and wouldn't be good for days.

I don‚Äôt know where to begin with this cream. It has ultimately SAVED my skin. I absolutely, 100% recommend this to anyone with eczema and have symptoms such as dry, itchy, torn, bloody, cracked, skin. I would also add that any bar soap with oatmeal as an ingredient definitely aids the healing process, along with this cream. I have tried Suave, Nivea, and even CeraVe, but none of the other brands have shown results such as Aveeno. It took about 4 days of constant use for my hands to take a noticeable change, but during this cold winter it has been the easiest on my skin while using this cream. The oiliness is very much in control; it does not give the sensation like there is butter on your palms. After I apply this cream, I am able to use my phone (with no case btw) and I remain to have full grip. It‚Äôs too affordable to not at least try it out if you are suffering from dry, brittle skin.

review name: Stops Itch and prevents unsightly scratching
review text: This product has stopped me from scratching my spots that usually turn into unsightly scars. Now when I have an itch, I put this balm on, and the urge to scratch off my skin is gone. Thank goodness for this cream! I love that it is unscented and steroid-free. It really protects my skin from me. I would recommend this product to anyone who has an itchy skin problem.
This didn't fully work for me. I found that cocoa butter lotion worked a lot better. I used to use¬†

review name: Next Best Thing to Hydrocortisone (Steroid) Cream
review text:
I have had a consistent butterfly rash for the last 8 years. In addition, I have extremely sensitive skin. I was using a steroid cream, but stopped due to concerns about thinning skin. I have done a lot research and tried so many products, and none of them worked until Aveeno Eczema cream. I could see the results almost instantly. I went a month without a rash. When I did finally have a breakout, it wasnt nearly as bad as it normally is. The skin in the affected area wasn't as hard, scaly or flaky.

I normally apply this lotion once a day. If I have a rash, I apply it to the affected area to moisturize and provide relief for itchiness and burning.

This lotion is very moisturizing and non-greasy. I try to be light handed because its rich. I have oily skin, so sometimes Ill use it all over my face, and sometimes I just apply the lotion to my t-zone and spread it outwards onto my cheeks.

I pair my lotion with a sunblock. For those with sun sensitivity (which is common for anyone with a butterfly / malar rash) you may want to give La Roche-Posay Anthelios 60 Ultra Light Sunscreen a try. Its light, theres very little cast, and it doesnt cause me to breakout. Its a little pricey, but its so worth it.¬†

I ordered the 7.3 oz bottle and it doesn't have any tamper resistant seal AT ALL! No plastic cover, no cap cover, no seal on the inside of tube. None anywhere. There's no way of knowing if this product is authentic and safe to use. Returning it immediately. The store bottles are all sealed. Why isn't this one?

review name: Works Great, Even on Skin Without Eczema
review text: Originally I purchased this lotion for my occasional winter eczema, and it worked well. I ran out of hand lotion and grabbed this and have been using it daily ever since! It provides the perfect amount of moisture for dry, frequently washed hands. It feels thick and a little greasy when you first put it on, but it immediately absorbs well and the greasy feel disappears.

I have had itchy hands since the beginning of this COVID problem. Between washing my hands more often and the fact that my skin is dry to begin with, I was always scratching and only making things worse. I use this lotion once or twice a day and the itching has gone away. It is somewhat expensive for lotion, but it works. I use this in the morning and occasionally at night and other lotion if I need it during the day (which I actually don't very often). I will order once again when I run out.

review name: Heals and softens dry, cracked skin without greasy residue
review text: I have had a very minor case of eczema for years that has been easily controlled by judicious and sporadic application of a prescription medication. However, with all the handwashing needed during the COVID-19 outbreak, the prescription med had zero effect. My skin on my hands was cracking and peeling despite continued application of the Rx topical ointment. I purchased the Aveeno Eczema Therapy cream thinking it couldn‚Äôt hurt. After a single application, the dry and cracking skin disappeared! I was flabbergasted, to say the least. The product is not greasy and absorbs completely into the skin, so you don‚Äôt have to worry about getting it on any fabric. Moreover, it takes a very small amount to cover a good-sized area. This product is nothing short of miraculous! I‚Äôve never liked using hand lotions or creams because the do tend to be too greasy. I‚Äôm using this daily.

review name: Super thick & a bit too greasy for me
review text: I mean, this is certainly hydrating, but I like my lotion to absorb and let my skin breathe and this feels more like slathering yourself in antibiotic ointment. Perhaps it is what is needed for Eczema and to be fair, I did NOT purchase it for that particular skin condition. I do like that it's unscented - always a plus for my sensitive skin.

I have had red patches on my cheeks for some time now. NOTHING I did got rid of them. I've tried face creams, lotions, special soaps, acne medicine...the patches were flaky and my skin was constantly peeling. I thought I'd try this, even though I felt like the one active ingredient wouldn't change anything. I was so wrong! It took about 5 days or so, but now the red, flaky patches are GONE. I have my face back! So happy

I have suffered from eczema for many years. My hands would get so dry I could sandpaper a wall. Tired of having to resort to steroid ointments, I started looking for a better alternative. I've tried many brands and types of lotions: Vaseline, Curel, St. Ives, Goldbond, Burt's Bees, the list goes on. I saw the reviews claiming the Aveeno Eczema Therapy was nothing short of a miracle. I was skeptical, but gave it a shot.

Let me tell you, this lotion really is like a miracle. After about a day of applying it twice, I could already notice the sandpaper feeling was gone. I've been using it for about 3 weeks now, and my eczema is under control. There's still a spot of severely stubborn inflammation, but for mild to moderate cases, I couldn't imagine recommending any other brand or lotion.

Buy it. It works.

I've had flaking and cracking eczema on my hands for over a decade. Steroid creams eventually don't work once I'm used to them. This is a great daily hand cream. Does a fairly good job of stopping the nagging itch and I can definitely see they are softer and less dry. Warning, if you have open cracks or raw skin from eczema it will obviously sting but fades eventually. I would recommend

i was having an eczema flare up randomly after years and nothing would sooth or stop the itching. i no longer had prescribed creams. this literally helped my case. and it keeps my skin very moistured. it did take maybe a day to completely remove my itchiness but i now use this everyday and the jar is big enough to last for awhile

This is the first lotion I've found that really helps prevent my kid's eczema from flaring up. It's super moisturizing and doesn't seem to irritate any eczema patches that do manage to appear. It's a tiny bit oily when you first apply it but eventually soaks in. We just apply it after shower & cover with pajamas & socks.

review name: It works well for dry skin!!!!
review text: It works for dry skin, but I personally can not stand the way it feels on my hands. I mainly use it for my son who has flare ups from his eczema. My nose peels really bad especially in the winter, and this really is the only thing I found that helps. But after I apply it, I have to was my hands, I honestly feel this way about most Aveeno lotions which is why I rarely buy them.

review text: My baby is so sensitive to everything but this has been fantastic for him. He has eczema and a rash due to a milk allergy and this is the only thing we have found that keeps it under control. They also have a balm that goes with this that is great for really bad areas. Their oatmeal bath packets are amazing as well.

I started getting terribly itchy eczema round my wedding ring especially after using a lot of hand sanitizer and alcohol during the covid pandemic. It was really uncomfortable and I bought this cream just to try and oh boy was I lucky. This definitely helped my itchy eczema and it was cured in less than five days. I definitely recommend this if you suffer from itchy dry skin and/or eczema.

review text: I have been using this for over ten years. Working as a healthcare provider in both hospital and outpatient settings, my hands become so irritated in the winter. I originally bought this from Target when a Youtuber recommended it for eczema. The colloidal oatmeal was the ingredient that was the game changer. I found that it keeps some of my dry, sensitive and eczema prone areas at bay and have less breakouts . I would highly recommend and was glad to find it on Amazon!

I think it got a bit worse after the first day, but within 3 days the redness is completely gone and there's only a hint of dryness. And it's non-steroid, so I feel safer continuing to use it. Would definitely recommend!

This is the only product out of many we‚Äôve tried (including a prescription topical steroid) that has helped my preschool child‚Äôs eczema. As long as I put it on every single day, the eczema spots on his feet and legs stay under control and don‚Äôt bother him at all. It has no scent and is VERY moisturizing. He didn‚Äôt particularly like the sensation on his skin at first, since it is quite thick, but he‚Äôs gotten used to it and now knows that it keep his ‚Äúitchies‚Äù away. I am a happy mama!

My girlfriend has suffered from eczema since she was a toddler. She has tried Aveeno daily moisturizing and she said it was okay. But once she saw that aveeno had a particular lotion for eczema she decided to give it a try. She says it works amazing. It has no scent, and when she applies she says it moisturizes so we‚Äôll that when she showers, right before she scrubs her body she can still feel the lotion on. She highly recommends!!! Give it a try!

review name: Made my sons eczema disappear believe the reviews!
review text: Wow, my sons eczema hot spots are on his inner arm/elbow crease and his hands. I made the mistake of using a big glob at first and it felt like rubbing a crap load of vaseline into my hands. That being said, it's very hydrating and soothing! I have eczema on my hand and it's gotten worse with COVID and so much hand washing. So far I'm very happy with it and I think it will last a very long time!

I was diagnosed with Dyshidrotic eczema several years ago and when the flareups happen, they are horrible. My doctor recommended I use produces from Aveeno specifically for eczema with no scent and with colloidal oatmeal. The Aveeno Eczema Therapy is thick and rich with no smell. I can put it on my hands and feet at night and when I wake up my skin is calm and I can actually focus on tasks that need to be done rather than focusing on my eczema.

I had an eczema rash on my hands and needed a product that contained no perfumes or strong chemicals. While this product didn‚Äôt irritate the skin, I needed a prescription to clear up the rash. I now use this product several times a day to protect my hands and it absorbs quickly and is not greasy. It will now be my go to hand cream.

This is the daily lotion we use for our kids, both of whom tend to get red inflamed skin in the winter months due to the dry air. This lotion typically prevents any eczema outbreaks. For really stubborn spots we use the healing night balm which is thicker and has a bit more staying power but this is a good product for day time use because it wears well without looking or feeling greasy.

This is my first using this product and I love it I have very dry skin and have been use baby oil which does not last long, my daughter order Aveeno and it works great. Threw my baby oil away and this will be my go to lotion for now on. I wish I could find one with a scent.

Bought this for my gf when her eczema started acting up really bad. She said it's working well and is helping to make the itch and pain go away. I'm not a big fan of the way it feels, (I've had to help her apply it and I used it on my razor burn) but I assume since it's not meant to be rubbed in that is normal. Highly recommend for anyone with skin issues.

Got this because my hands were so rough and red from washing my hands so much. Also when wearing gloves I would get a rash on my hands so I bought this and just lather it all over my hands especially at night and it‚Äôs like a mask. Love it definitely will buy again and again

This stuff is amazing! It was recommended by a dermatologist for chapped lips, which is my main reason for the purchase, but now I use it on my face, too. I also use it on my child, who is mixed and has very dry skin. This is the first time I have lips that didn't feel chapped all winter!!!

review name: Works great but, better if used with the colloidal oatmeal.
review text:
This is a superb product for the skin. I have really BAD problems with pollen. I know when the pollen is back every year because my legs begin to itch which gets worse as we move into summer. By summer, the area close to elbows on my arms sometime welts up, pores visibly open, severe itching that no medicine can control. Yes, I see an Allergenist.
The only thing that works is a cold pack or the colloidal oatmeal. With this, I mixed the Aveeno Colloidal Oatmeal into the balm and apply. Oh my, no more itching! Thank you Aveeno.

I'm not sure why the labeling says "non-greasy" because it is VERY GREASY. I do sewing and I have to wait 15-30 minutes before my hands are cleared up of the grease so that I don't damage the fabric I'm working on. When I first received the product I thought it might be greasy because of some temperature condition while being shipped. That wasn't the reason. It's simply very greasy. Period.

Works well but be prepared, this has a very thick ointment feel for those who really need the Colloidal Oatmeal relief, and may be overkill for some. It is not a thin lotion or standard cream like some other brands. If nothing else has worked for you, this may be worth a shot. It does work well for certain conditions.

Absolutely excellent moisterizing cream for babies whenyou feel that nothing else is working. Highly recommend this balm for babies rash problems. Great price. Very easy to apply and spread compared to other products. Consult with pediatrician on use if worried.

I got this for my husbands eczema, but he didn‚Äôt really like how it‚Äôs creamy and thick. So, I‚Äôve been using it for an ant bite allergy that I‚Äôve been recovering from. And it‚Äôs helped ALOT. I‚Äôve been in so much uncomfortable pain, but this cream has helped a lot. I‚Äôm thankful that I purchased it.

This is a game changer for me. Mainly during the winter my hands and knuckles crack and bleed with the cold air. It's seriously painful and now adding in sanitizing my hands hundreds of times a day they are even worse. I ran out and couldn't find it in the local store so I went to Amazon and yes! They had it!

. I had a bad wound and it was doing great and now the end is taking soooo long. Maybe it is me, I just want it gone. üòè

It is the thickest lotion I have ever used but my skin is moisturized until the next time that I shower so I‚Äôve been impressed. An amazing product that feels really good on the itchiest skin. I got a sample at the doctors office and ordered some after using the sample. If you have itchy skin, excema, etc. I highly recommend. It is slightly thicker so it works so much better than just a lotion. Like all Aveeno products it really works.

I have suffered with so many skin problems (mostly on my face) but recently developed eczema on my inner arms. It wasn‚Äôt awful, but the itching was unbearable. I used aveeno eczema therapy lotion about 6 times and it went away... no itching, no scaling, no redness. Like I said, my eczema really wasn‚Äôt bad BUT this worked like a charm for me.

review name: The only product that works for my son‚Äôs eczema, works better than all his prescriptions!
review text: This stuff is amazing, we love it here. It literally is the only product we have tried that has actually worked for my son‚Äôs eczema and we have tried a lot, including prescription strength products. We noticed that it works the best when put on immediately after a shower or right before bed. It works great!! Oh and buy it on Amazon, it‚Äôs cheaper, especially with the subscribe and save option.

review text: Jus got the other day. Fighting bad itchy rash. It has helped relieve the itchiness, to soon tell about healing. It is thick an kinda sticky.make sure rub in well. I put it on at night an use something else during day. Good smell,nothing strong which I like.
